channel.title: Should every class have 2 day and 2 night abilities?
channel.description: Yes or no? I say yes, because why not? The more the better right?

item.title: Should every class have 2 day and 2 night abilities?
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
No they aren’t

Knight needs a buff that gives him the ability to KILL EVERYONE that is evil

NK to Op plz nerf

Read full topic
item.source: Should every class have 2 day and 2 night abilities?

item.title: Should every class have 2 day and 2 night abilities?
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
Nah. It’s part of the class, part of their power, and is fine.

That’s not a reason to give every class a day power, though.

Knight, Drunk, Hunter, Observer, Princess, Paladin, and such are all fine without day powers though.

Read full topic
item.source: Should every class have 2 day and 2 night abilities?

item.title: Should every class have 2 day and 2 night abilities?

item.description:
Okay fine, every class except Prince (I had forgotten about Prince but I think every other class could be made even funner with another ability)

item.source: Should every class have 2 day and 2 night abilities?

item.title: Should every class have 2 day and 2 night abilities?
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
If it needs it to be powerful enough, yes, otherwise no.

Not every class needs to be maxed out though. Generally you need at least 2 powers, but there’s no reason for every class to be maxed out.

Read full topic
